result.eng: Am I so bad?
result.ga: An bhfuil mé chomh dona sin
result.orig: An bhfuil mé chomh dona sin
result.html: An bhfuil mé chomh dona sinAm I so bad?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil mé ċoṁ dona sinAm I so bad?

result.eng: The translator should not only read the text carefully but do a bit of research as well.
result.ga: B'fhearr don aistritheoir ní amháin an téacs a léamh go cúramach ach roinnt taighde a dhéanamh chomh maith
result.orig: B'fhearr don aistritheoir ní amháin an téacs a léamh go cúramach ach roinnt taighde a dhéanamh chomh maith
result.html: B'fhearr don aistritheoir ní amháin an téacs a léamh go cúramach ach roinnt taighde a dhéanamh chomh maithThe translator should not only read the text carefully but do a bit of research as well.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟearr don aistriṫeoir ní aṁáin an téacs a léaṁ go cúramaċ aċ roinnt taiġde a ḋéanaṁ ċoṁ maiṫThe translator should not only read the text carefully but do a bit of research as well.

result.eng: I met the Prime Minister, and I met the President as well.
result.ga: Bhuail mé leis an Taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an Uachtarán chomh maith
result.orig: Bhuail mé leis an Taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an Uachtarán chomh maith
result.html: Bhuail mé leis an Taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an Uachtarán chomh maithI met the Prime Minister, and I met the President as well.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail mé leis an Taoiseaċ agus ḃuail mé leis an Uaċtarán ċoṁ maiṫI met the Prime Minister, and I met the President as well.

result.eng: They use the sickle sometimes but it is not as good as the knife.
result.ga: Bíonn an corrán in úsáid uaireanta ach níl sé chomh maith leis an scian
result.orig: Bíonn an corrán in úsáid uaireanta ach níl sé chomh maith leis an scian

result.ponchtml: Bíonn an corrán in úsáid uaireanta aċ níl sé ċoṁ maiṫ leis an scianThey use the sickle sometimes but it is not as good as the knife.

result.eng: Who would pay for such badly made clothes?
result.ga: Cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sin
result.orig: Cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sin
result.html: Cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sinWho would pay for such badly made clothes?
result.ponchtml: Cé a d'íocfaḋ airgead ar éadaí a ḃí déanta ċoṁ dona sinWho would pay for such badly made clothes?

result.eng: How long is it?
result.ga: Cé chomh fada is atá sé
result.orig: Cé chomh fada is atá sé
result.html: Cé chomh fada is atá séHow long is it?
result.ponchtml: Cé ċoṁ fada is atá séHow long is it?

result.eng: How good is the country's bus network?
result.ga: Cé chomh maith is atá líonra bus na tíre
result.orig: Cé chomh maith is atá líonra bus na tíre
result.html: Cé chomh maith is atá líonra bus na tíreHow good is the country's bus network?
result.ponchtml: Cé ċoṁ maiṫ is atá líonra bus na tíreHow good is the country's bus network?

result.eng: How often does he come?
result.ga: Cé chomh minic is a thagann sé
result.orig: Cé chomh minic is a thagann sé
result.html: Cé chomh minic is a thagann séHow often does he come?
result.ponchtml: Cé ċoṁ minic is a ṫagann séHow often does he come?

result.eng: How big was it?
result.ga: Cé chomh mór is a bhí sé
result.orig: Cé chomh mór is a bhí sé
result.html: Cé chomh mór is a bhí séHow big was it?
result.ponchtml: Cé ċoṁ mór is a ḃí séHow big was it?

result.eng: Why did you stay so long?
result.ga: Cén fáth ar fhan tú chomh fada sin
result.orig: Cén fáth ar fhan tú chomh fada sin
result.html: Cén fáth ar fhan tú chomh fada sinWhy did you stay so long?
result.ponchtml: Cén fáṫ ar ḟan tú ċoṁ fada sinWhy did you stay so long?

result.eng: He meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.
result.ga: Ní sláinte an choirp amháin a bhí i gceist aige ach sláinte na haigne chomh maith
result.orig: Ní sláinte an choirp amháin a bhí i gceist aige ach sláinte na haigne chomh maith
result.html: Ní sláinte an choirp amháin a bhí i gceist aige ach sláinte na haigne chomh maithHe meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.
result.ponchtml: Ní sláinte an ċoirp aṁáin a ḃí i gceist aige aċ sláinte na haigne ċoṁ maiṫHe meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.

result.eng: You are not as pretty as me.
result.ga: Níl tú chomh hálainn liomsa
result.orig: Níl tú chomh hálainn liomsa
result.html: Níl tú chomh hálainn liomsaYou are not as pretty as me.
result.ponchtml: Níl tú ċoṁ hálainn liomsaYou are not as pretty as me.

result.eng: We are recycling cans and bottles, as well as ordinary rubbish.
result.ga: Tá muid ag athchúrsáil cannaí agus buidéal chomh maith le gnáthbhruscar
result.orig: Tá muid ag athchúrsáil cannaí agus buidéal chomh maith le gnáthbhruscar

result.ponchtml: Tá muid ag aṫċúrsáil cannaí agus buidéal ċoṁ maiṫ le gnáṫḃruscarWe are recycling cans and bottles, as well as ordinary rubbish.

result.eng: I have corrected it on the website as well.
result.ga: Tá sé ceartaithe agam ar an suíomh gréasáin chomh maith
result.orig: Tá sé ceartaithe agam ar an suíomh gréasáin chomh maith
result.html: Tá sé ceartaithe agam ar an suíomh gréasáin chomh maithI have corrected it on the website as well.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ceartaiṫe agam ar an suíoṁ gréasáin ċoṁ maiṫI have corrected it on the website as well.

result.eng: You're as black as smoke.
result.ga: Tá tú chomh dubh le deatach
result.orig: Tá tú chomh dubh le deatach
result.html: Tá tú chomh dubh le deatachYou're as black as smoke.
result.ponchtml: Tá tú ċoṁ duḃ le deataċYou're as black as smoke.

result.eng: How good is your Spanish?
result.ga: Cé chomh maith is atá do chuid Spáinnise
result.orig: Cé chomh maith is atá do chuid Spáinnise
result.html: Cé chomh maith is atá do chuid SpáinniseHow good is your Spanish?
result.ponchtml: Cé ċoṁ maiṫ is atá do ċuid SpáinniseHow good is your Spanish?

result.eng: Me too!
result.ga: Mise chomh maith
result.orig: Mise chomh maith
result.html: Mise chomh maithMe too!
result.ponchtml: Mise ċoṁ maiṫMe too!

result.eng: She is married as well.
result.ga: Tá sise pósta chomh maith
result.orig: Tá sise pósta chomh maith
result.html: Tá sise pósta chomh maithShe is married as well.
result.ponchtml: Tá sise pósta ċoṁ maiṫShe is married as well.

result.eng: You were so alike when you were little!
result.ga: Bhí sibh chomh cosúil lena chéile nuair a bhí sibh beag
result.orig: Bhí sibh chomh cosúil lena chéile nuair a bhí sibh beag
result.html: Bhí sibh chomh cosúil lena chéile nuair a bhí sibh beagYou were so alike when you were little!
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siḃ ċoṁ cosúil lena ċéile nuair a ḃí siḃ beagYou were so alike when you were little!

result.eng: My mother's aunt is living with us as well.
result.ga: Tá aintín le mo mháthair ina cónaí linn chomh maith
result.orig: Tá aintín le mo mháthair ina cónaí linn chomh maith

result.ponchtml: Tá aintín le mo ṁáṫair ina cónaí linn ċoṁ maiṫMy mother's aunt is living with us as well.

result.eng: I like swimming as well.
result.ga: Is maith liom a bheith ag snámh chomh maith
result.orig: Is maith liom a bheith ag snámh chomh maith
result.html: Is maith liom a bheith ag snámh chomh maithI like swimming as well.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom a ḃeiṫ ag snáṁ ċoṁ maiṫI like swimming as well.

result.eng: I watch TV. I surf the internet as well.
result.ga: Bím ag amharc ar an teilifís Bím ag scimeáil ar an idirlíon chomh maith
result.orig: Bím ag amharc ar an teilifís Bím ag scimeáil ar an idirlíon chomh maith
result.html: Bím ag amharc ar an teilifís Bím ag scimeáil ar an idirlíon chomh maithI watch TV. I surf the internet as well.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag aṁarc ar an teilifís Bím ag scimeáil ar an idirlíon ċoṁ maiṫI watch TV. I surf the internet as well.

result.eng: How often do you go to plays? - Very seldom.
result.ga: Cé chomh minic is a théann tú chuig drámaí - Go fíorannamh

result.html: Cé chomh minic is a théann tú chuig drámaí - Go fíorannamhHow often do you go to plays? - Very seldom.
result.ponchtml: Cé ċoṁ minic is a ṫéann tú ċuig drámaí - Go fíorannaṁHow often do you go to plays? - Very seldom.

result.eng: That doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.
result.ga: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin
result.orig: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin

result.eng: One of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.
result.ga: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín
result.orig: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín

result.ponchtml: Rinne duine aṁáin drannaḋ liom agus ḃraiṫ mé ċoṁ beag le mo lúidínOne of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.

result.eng: My brothers were as thin as sticks.
result.ga: Bhí mo chuid deartháireacha chomh seang leis an maide
result.orig: Bhí mo chuid deartháireacha chomh seang leis an maide
result.html: Bhí mo chuid deartháireacha chomh seang leis an maideMy brothers were as thin as sticks.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mo ċuid dearṫáireaċa ċoṁ seang leis an maideMy brothers were as thin as sticks.

result.eng: He had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ga: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.orig: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.html: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé de ṁisneaċ aige t-léinte a ċaiṫeaṁ a ḃí ċoṁ teann sin go mbeaḋ eagla ort go bpollfaḋ a ḋidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.

result.eng: The pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ga: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.orig: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.html: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an pota ċoṁ mór sin go ḃféadfá braċán do ṫeaċ lán boċtán a ḋéanaṁ annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.

result.eng: The biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.
result.ga: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad
result.orig: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad
result.html: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siadThe biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.
result.ponchtml: An rud is mó atá le taḃairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná ċoṁ hamaitéaraċ is a ḃí siadThe biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.

result.eng: She lost her passport as well as other official documents.
result.ga: Chaill sí a pas chomh maith le doiciméid oifigiúla eile
result.orig: Chaill sí a pas chomh maith le doiciméid oifigiúla eile
result.html: Chaill sí a pas chomh maith le doiciméid oifigiúla eileShe lost her passport as well as other official documents.
result.ponchtml: Ċaill sí a pas ċoṁ maiṫ le doiciméid oifigiúla eileShe lost her passport as well as other official documents.

result.eng: It wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.orig: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.html: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maithIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ ag na Naitsiṫe ċoṁ maiṫIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: Of course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ga: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.orig: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.html: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ponchtml: Ar ndóiġ ḃí cuid acu ċoṁ leaṁ le ḃeiṫ ag aṁarc ar ṁúscán gorm ag fás ar ṗíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: Wow, she's so small!
result.ga: Órú chomh beag léi
result.orig: Órú chomh beag léi
result.html: Órú chomh beag léiWow, she's so small!
result.ponchtml: Órú ċoṁ beag léiWow, she's so small!

result.eng: They decorated everything as neatly as they could.
result.ga: Feistíodh 'ach aon rud chomh deismir agus a féadadh
result.orig: Feistíodh 'ach aon rud chomh deismir agus a féadadh
result.html: Feistíodh 'ach aon rud chomh deismir agus a féadadhThey decorated everything as neatly as they could.
result.ponchtml: Feistíoḋ 'aċ aon rud ċoṁ deismir agus a féadaḋThey decorated everything as neatly as they could.

result.eng: He was so short of sense as a child five years younger than him.
result.ga: Bhí sé chomh gann i gcéill leis an leanbh a bhí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná é
result.orig: Bhí sé chomh gann i gcéill leis an leanbh a bhí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná é

result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ċoṁ gann i gcéill leis an leanḃ a ḃí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná éHe was so short of sense as a child five years younger than him.

result.eng: You could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ga: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.orig: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.html: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ċoṁ maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag caint leis an ġealaċ le a ḃeiṫ ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.

result.eng: If only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ga: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.orig: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.html: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ponchtml: Mo ċreaċ agus mo ċrá gan mé ċoṁ hóg leatsa inniu Ċaiṫfinn saol nár ċaiṫ méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
